list_definition.definition: the amount of rain that falls in a certain place in a certain time

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: We haven’t had much rainfall this year

list_ex_of_english: Sustained rainfall fell throughout the year even though the total amount during the long rainy season period was far below the usual average.
